text:
With emotional publication Mary MÃ©ndez revealed that her breast implants were removed
The presenter said she was happy with her new physical appearance and even said she felt younger.

07 Nov 2019

There is little that the renowned presenter Mary MÃ©ndez usually publishes of her private life on social networks, however, this time she decided to share her experience with her Instagram followers after making the drastic decision to remove breast implants from her body.
With a smiling photograph, and without implants, the presenter of La Red revealed that 15 days ago she entered the operating room and removed her prostheses, which she had for more than 20 years.
"And if you notice something strange, yes, 15 days ago I decided to go to the operating room and remove the breast prostheses that were part of my life for more than 20 years ... those that had me on everyone's lips in the 90's (... ) â€, Says part of the presenter's extensive message.
Right there, he confessed that, although the implants initially gave him happiness, over time they became "an emotional burden" in which he felt he needed his free body, which is why he made the decision.
After the drastic change, the presenter said she was happy with her new physical appearance and even said she felt younger.
â€œ(â€¦) I still don't believe it! I look at myself and I only feel happiness, I literally feel that morally, psychologically and physically I took a weight off, that I regret not having made the decision before, that I am ridiculously happy with my appearance, (...) I feel 30 years old minor since I returned to the market of the "accustomer" ðŸ¤£ â€
Hundreds of users did not hesitate to applaud the presenter, pointing out that it is an example for other women and expressing her admiration.
